Strings.String:
A great way to upgrade and unlock your basic weapons, mods and characters.
Includes 5 random items or characters, with a small chance for an Uncommon.

Even more of the best equipment for the galaxy's best operatives.
Includes 5 random items or characters, with at least 2 Rares or better and a higher chance for Ultra-Rares.

The best equipment for the galaxy's best operatives.
Includes 5 random items or characters, with at least 1 Rare or better.

Advanced hardware and training for experienced operatives.
Includes 5 random items or characters, with at least 1 Uncommon or better.
Redeem your free starter pack to unlock new weapons and characters!
Unlock your Battlefield 3 Limited Edition soldier!
Heavy-hitting Collector assault rifle with advanced accuracy stabilization.
Increase health bonus and barrier bonus by {HealthShieldBonus%b}%.
Press ([PC_MoveBackward]) to exit turret and [Shared_Shoot] to fire

Cannot join game. Your friend is using downloadable content you don't have.
Go to the Main Menu and select (Downloadable Content) to get the content at no additional charge.

Even more of the best equipment for the galaxy's best operatives.
Includes 5 random items or characters with at least 2 Rares or better and a higher chance for Ultra-Rares.
Now with a chance to find new characters and weapons when the Earth Multiplayer Expansion is installed!
Move (Mouse) to aim and [Shared_Shoot] to fire
Hold [Shared_Aim] to pop up from cover and click [Shared_Shoot] to fire
Pre-Order - N7 Valkyrie Assault Rifle, N7 Defender Armor, M55 Argus Assault Rifle
PC Pre-Order - AT12 Raider Shotgun, M55 Argus Assault Rifle
Hold ([Shared_Aim]) to accurately aim your weapon.

Cannot join game. Your friend is using downloadable content you don't have.
Go to the Main Menu and select (Downloadable Content) to get the content at no additional charge.
A reward for participating in the Mass Effect 3 Recruitment Program.
A special bonus for dedicated Mass Effect fans.
A limited-release pack available only to owners of the Triforce M-8 Avenger Assault Rifle.
A limited-release pack available only to owners of the M-3 Predator Heavy Pistol.

Enough bonus equipment to survive any mission.
Includes 5 random equipment and supply items.
FOR TESTING ONLY - will grant all of the new DLC items. Please don't file bugs on this pack's appearance/translation.

The best way to upgrade and unlock your basic weapons, mods, and characters.
Includes five random items or characters with two chances for an Uncommon.

Advanced hardware and training for experienced operatives looking for an edge.
Includes five random items or characters with at least two Uncommons or better as well as a higher chance for Rares.

Even more of the best equipment for the galaxy's best operatives. Double the size of a Premium Spectre Pack!
Includes 10 random items or characters with at least four Rares or better as well as a higher chance for Ultra-Rares.

Load up on even more bonus equipment. Double the size of a regular Equipment Pack!
Includes 10 random equipment and supply items.

New allies and munitions available for the fight against the Reapers!
Includes five random items or characters with at least one of the new Resurgence Rares.

New allies rise up to join the fight!
Includes five random items or characters with at least one Rare or better as well as a higher chance for the new Rebellion content.

The best equipment for the galaxy's best operatives.
Includes five random items or characters with at least one Rare or better.
Now with a chance to find new characters and weapons when the Earth Multiplayer Expansion is installed!
Download the Resurgence Multiplayer Expansion at no additional charge.
Download the Resurgence Multiplayer Expansion to receive new maps and a chance to find reinforcement packs containing new characters, weapons, and equipment.
A gift from the Mass Effect team.
You have received this reward for Operation Resurgence.

Superior gear to round out your combat kit.
Includes 10 random equipment and supply items and a chance for Ultra-Rares.

It's easy to smile when you're armed to the teeth!
Includes five random items with at least two Rares or better, as well as a higher chance for weapons.

Need backup? Bring in fighters from all corners of the galaxy to diversify your team.
Includes five random items with at least two Rares or better, as well as a higher chance for characters.
ME3: WiiU Talk Table DLC Module
ME3: EoR Talk Table DLC Module
Earn <CUSTOM0> Points Using the Particle Rifle

The best equipment for the galaxy's best operatives.
Includes five random items or characters with at least one Rare or better.

Even more of the best equipment for the galaxy's best operatives.
Includes five random items or characters with at least two Rares or better as well as a higher chance for Ultra-Rares.
Earn <CUSTOM0> Points Using One of the Four N7 Commendation Weapons
Earn a Gold Melee Medal with a Krogan Character
Earn the "Survive Five Waves" Medal as a Squad on Palaven
You have received this reward because the community met the challenge of the Operation OVERDRIVE event.
A reward for successfully meeting the Operation OVERDRIVE squad challenge.

Even more of the best equipment for the galaxy's best operatives.
Includes five random items or characters with at least two Rares or better as well as a higher chance for Ultra-Rares.
A reward for successfully meeting a Weekend Challenge.
Extract <CUSTOM0> Times on Firebase Ghost or [Ux2623] Firebase Ghost [Ux2623]
Earn <CUSTOM0> points by killing husks or abominations.
Earn <CUSTOM0> points by killing brutes, scions, praetorians, or banshees.
A free bonus pack for owners of the Trilogy Collection.
Extract <CUSTOM0> Times with a Human Character
Earn <CUSTOM0> points using the M-55 Argus assault rifle.
Earn <CUSTOM0> points using the AT-12 Raider shotgun.
Earn <CUSTOM0> points using the N7 Valkyrie assault rifle.
Go undercover to follow a lead.
Infiltrate an enemy stronghold with your crew.
Stop an out-of-control scheme before it's too late.
Throw a party for your friends.
Win a prize at one of the arcade games.
Investigate a strange occurrence in the combat simulator.
Score 9999 points in the combat simulator on Normal, Hardcore, or Insanity.
Earn <CUSTOM0> points as any engineer class.
Extract <CUSTOM0> Times as any Engineer Class
Score <CUSTOM0> cumulative total points versus shielded enemies.
Complete <CUSTOM0> cumulative total extractions of batarian, vorcha, or turian characters.
A Commendation Pack awarded for completing the individual challenge in Operation PRIVATEER.
A Victory Pack awarded for completing the allied challenge in Operation PRIVATEER.

Extract as any base human male.
Extract as any base human female.
Defeat a group of Spectre-level opponents on Normal, Hardcore, or Insanity.

Superior gear to round out your combat kit.
Includes 5 random consumables with a small chance for Ultra-Rare weapons or characters.
